mapper.sql: id, name, gender, birthday, source, sys_user_id, status, del_flag, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from coop_third_baby_info where 1=1 and del_flag = '0'
and sys_user_id = #{sysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into coop_third_baby_info(id, name, gender, birthday, source, sys_user_id, status, del_flag, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
